name: Nightcore girl
intro_dialogue: For some reason, that happens to me often. *says cutely*
See? It just doesn't go away...
It's so cringy... I wanna dissapear...
Now's my chance! Let's introduce myself.

replies.response: I FREAKING WOULD IF I COULD!!!
Great. Now it's happening to you.
BAHAHAHHAHA! Duuude, like great use of an awkward situation!
Uhhh... Nothing much, I guess.
Oh, nice to meet you. I'm a grad student here. Already got my witch hat, see?

questions.text: S-So uh... I don't usually get this far into a convo...

replies.response: Relatable...

replies.text: Well, what are you looking at on your phone?
replies.response: O-Oh this thing? It doesn't really work anymore. I've burned it too many times.
That sounds creepy and it looks creepy too...
I don't hate this reply. But I feel like you could have done better. *says cutely*

questions.text: O-Okay. I think I've stopped that weird thing from- *says cutely*. I DIDN'T EVEN FINISH MY SENTENCE!

replies.response: DON'T YOU TELL ME TO CALM DOWN!

replies.text: Do you need some help with that?
replies.response: YES, I WOULD. THANK YOU VERY MUCH.
...WHY DIDN'T I THINK OF THAT?!?!
...ANGR

questions.text: SCREW IT. LET'S TURN THE HEAT UP. WHAT DO YOU USUALLY SPEND TIME DOING?

replies.response: Mid.
Nice!
Dude. Aren't you supposed to not tell that to a witch you're currently talking to?
You. I like you. We're friends now.
Man, I wish
I wouldn't know.. Never had one.
I would have rather you wait out the time than choose this option.
As a pro witch, I've never cheated in my life.

questions.text: WHERE WILL YOU BE AT 9pm THIS SUNDAY?

replies.response: At 9 at night??
Oh... Ok.
Ok.
W-With me?

questions.text: Whew.. I'm out of breath. We've been talking for a while.

replies.response: Not gonna help a witch out?
T-That's a sign, buddy. Hint hint. Nudge nudge.

replies.text: Let's go take a seat at that bench over there.
replies.response: Thanks for the offer but I'll be fine after I breath a bit.

replies.text: Me too.. Talking to witches is hard work.
replies.response: Tell me about it! I hate talking to my classmates.
Shush. I know it already. I have a super special witch condition that makes me not able to talk to people well...

replies.text: Am I gonna do that again?
replies.response: *laughs* Yeah. I'm not done with you yet.

questions.text: Wait! I-I think it's gone! I haven't really had anymore of those things!

replies.text: Oh yeah.. Didn't notice... Too busy talking.
replies.response: Conversation pro over here.
Hey... Say something... Don't jinx me!
Wdym, bro? I'm practically a conversation god at this point!

replies.text: Just jinxed yourself, dude. Now it's gonna happen.
replies.response: Crap... You're right!

questions.text: Well either way- *stutters cutely* ... Please, just end my misery.

replies.response: That's it. Time for round 2!
Don't just judge me silently! I don't like this either.

replies.text: I almost thought you were cool.
replies.response: I could light you ablaze in seconds!

replies.text: I have no idea how to help you.
replies.response: Ugh. *turns head angrily*

replies.text: Let's try talking a lot again.
replies.response: Good idea! Let's start!
You gotta answer, buddy.
How cute!
Blocked.
Basic but acceptable.
Ugly little cat..
Ah! I see what you did there!
Honestly. Understandable, have a nice day.
Eh. I liked it. Ig.

replies.text: Magical Beasts and Where to find them!
replies.response: My. literal. favorite. class. and book!
Weird choice..
BWHAAAHAHAH
Just stop! Is it really that hard to click any other option??
T-That's a crime...
OH... M-MOLTEN??!
How basic... Not even a magical fruit.
I don't want to know what those are..
Simple enough. Can't pass up a basic banana.
That's not a good sign...
O-Oh...

replies.text: The first one I saw earlier.
replies.response: W-Who? Oh, you mean Stemma? She's really nice so I understand...

ignored_responses: I am a pyromage for a reason... *says annoyedly*
Why? Every guy I talk to ends like this...
outro_dialogue: I can't say another word! I'm out of breath and exhausted...
This was nice though... I-It was nice to meet you and have a chat.
Y-Your conversation skills are top-notch. Good luck talking to other witches.
L-Let me know if you want to ever talk again...
Wait. Isn't your thing gone? You're talking normally now.
What? Wait.. Y-You're right! I don't have that weird bubble following me around anymore!
Th-This must be because of our talking! Thank you for helping me fix this problem even if it's temporary.
Good luck! And thank you again for this talk!
